title: Acupuncture: an exploration
creator_credit: Permagum Productions, FilmFair Communications and Franklin Konigsberg
brief_description: Describes current experiments confirming the effectiveness of acupuncture points. Theories are given explaining its success as an analgesic for surgery, also an outline on the history of acupuncture is briefly explained.
creator_credit_for_label: Permagum Productions, FilmFair Communications and Franklin Konigsberg
